name: Baldi's Basics Plus Scratch Edition
description: Welcome to the new scratched experience of baldi's basics plus! The controls are Left and right arrow keys to turn around, A to walk forwards, D to walk backwards, W or up arrow key to go right and S or down arrow key to go left. and this is a beta of my baldi's basics project i am making, i will be adding more soon! Anyways, check information on the title screen for information about the characters.I will change how the characters work since i am not so good at scratch and so i cant recreate how they work so i will be changing it to one that can be scripted easily in the program i used to make this game. (scratch)
